price: كله چې په هغه ورننوتل وېلې سلام دې وي، هغه وويل سلام دې (پر تاسي هم) وي، څه نا اشنا خلک یاست.
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūna
